lead_paragraph: Battered by a presidential impeachment and the worst recession since the Great Depression, Brazil is getting a rare bit of relief as Rio de Janeiro prepares to host the Olympics: declining numbers of Zika infections.

headline.print_headline: Olympics Will Come and Go but Zika Is Here to Stay, Scientists Say
headline.main: Olympics Will Come and Go but Zika Is Here to Stay, Scientists Say

snippet: Battered by a presidential impeachment and the worst recession since the Great Depression, Brazil is getting a rare bit of relief as Rio de Janeiro prepares to host the Olympics: declining numbers of Zika infections....
